descriptionHTML:
The ultimate simplified interface - now for your smartwatch.

Compatible with all full-featured Android smartwatches, including IconBIT Callisto 100, Omate TrueSmart, ZGPAX S8.
NOT compatible with Android Wear watches like Samsung Gear Live, Moto 360, Sony Smartwatch and G Watch.

Customize your Android smartwatch to suit your needs. BIG Launcher Wearable uses large buttons and texts for all the functions of your smart watch - it isn’t just a launcher. All the features are enlarged, easy to read and easy to use.

✓ Phone call log
✓ Dialer
✓ Contacts with contacts editor
✓ SMS messaging
✓ Full screen SMS notifications
✓ Apps list with quick search
✓ Variable screen layouts
✓ Customizable backgrounds
✓ Downloadable color themes
✓ Customizable buttons
✓ Third-party icon packs support
✓ Widgets & shortcuts support
✓ Speak on long press (requires Talkback)
✓ Password protected settings

Everything is included in one app. Everything is fast and simple. 40 languages supported.

This version features two screen layouts optimized for wearable devices - 2x2 and 1x1 buttons.

All other features are the same as in the BIG Launcher Senior Phone - an award winning app with more than 30.000 satisfied users.

Be sure to try the BIG Launcher Senior Phone FREE DEMO before buying or visit http://biglauncher.com for more information and videos.
comments: need a refund wont go on my sony 3 wear its only on my phone

Hello,  I purchased this version to use on my smart watch and it installed successfully, however while customizing it I removed the settings shortcut from the launcher page and now I cannot access the settings or get back into edit mode. I am stuck in the launcher with acess two only two apps (camera and gallery) and I cannot hard reset my watch either. Is there an alernative way to get back into edit mode by touch only? Looking forward to any tips as I have run out of options.

Not for android wear Not for android wear, really! The developer could sell so many more if they supported android wear. I didn't read the description and downloaded it... only to refund it. Devs lost £1.50.
recentChanges: + sms reply from the call log
* better support for RTL text inputs
* better loudspeaker support on newer Android versions
+ preferences shortcut in the apps list
+ preferences background fixed for e-ink devices
+ ability to change dpi of resources
